subject: Re: [sugar] New activities proposals due today...
body: Kuku Anakula (Number Munchers clone) would like to be included in Trail 2.See wiki.laptop.org/go/Kuku for details - we are hosting our code on dev.laptop.org.The game is currently running on XO build 431 - testing more recent builds now.Cheers,Julius ---------------------------------------------------------------------------http://www.openwetware.org/wiki/User:Julius_B._Lucks---------------------------------------------------------------------------
